El bazo se retir, se recogi en medio RPMI de 5 ml (con L-glutamina y bicarbonato de sodio, R8758 Sigma 10% de FBS (F7524, Sigma) 1% de Pen/Strep (P4333, Sigma)) y se proces inmediatamente despus de los sacrificios para estimulacin inmune in vivo. Se extirparon tejido intestinal (2 segmentos de 3 cm de leon y colon ms cercanos al ciego y se utilizaron los 1 cm 2 cm ms lejanos del ciego) se montaron en las cmaras Ussing para el ensayo de permeabilidad intestinal. El ciego se retir, se pes y se almacen a -80 C para el anlisis de SCFA.Animals were sacrificed randomly with respect to treatment and test condition; Sampling was carried out between 9.00 a.m. and 2.30 p.m. Stem blood was collected in potassium EDTA (ethylenediaminetetraacetic acid) tubes and centrifuged for 15 minutes at 4000 g. Plasma was isolated and stored at -80C for later analysis. The brain was rapidly excised, dissected, and each brain region snap-frozen on dry ice and stored at -80C for later analysis. The spleen was removed, collected in 5 mL RPMI medium (with L-glutamine and sodium bicarbonate, R8758 Sigma 10% FBS (F7524, Sigma) 1% Pen/Strep (P4333, Sigma)) and processed immediately. after sacrifices for in vivo immune stimulation. Intestinal tissue (2 3 cm segments of ileum and colon closest to the cecum and the farthest 1 2 cm from the cecum used) were removed and mounted in Ussing chambers for intestinal permeability testing. The cecum was removed, weighed and stored at -80C for SCFA analysis.

Anlisis de monoaminasMonoamine analysis

La concentracin de neurotransmisores se analiz como se describe en el Ejemplo 10Neurotransmitter concentration was analyzed as described in Example 10

Ensayo de citoquinas de bazoSpleen cytokine assay

Los bazos se recogieron inmediatamente en 5 ml de medio RPMI despus del sacrificio y se cultivaron inmediatamente. Las clulas de bazo se homogeneizaron primero en este medio RPMI, seguido de 5 minutos de incubacin con 1 ml de tampn de lisis RBC (11814389001 ROCHE, Sigma). Se aadieron otros 10 ml de medio RPMI, seguido de una centrifugacin de 200G durante 5 minutos. El sobrenadante se filtr luego a travs de un colador de 40um. Las clulas se contaron y sembraron (4.000.000/ml de medio). Despus de 2,5 h de adaptacin, las clulas se estimularon con lipopolisacrido (LPS-2 pg/ml) o concanavalina A (ConA-,.5 pg/ml) durante 24 h. Despus de la estimulacin, se recogieron los sobrenadantes para evaluar la liberacin de citoquinas usando el kit V-pLeX Proinflammatory Panel 1 (ratn) (Meso Scale Discovery, Maryland, USA). Para TNFa, IL-10, IL-lp, interfern Y, CXCL2 e IL6. Los anlisis se realizaron usando MESO QuickPlex SQ 120, SECTOR Imager 2400, SECTOR Imager 6000, SECTOR S 600.Spleens were immediately harvested in 5 ml RPMI medium after sacrifice and cultured immediately. Spleen cells were first homogenized in this RPMI medium, followed by 5 min incubation with 1 ml RBC lysis buffer (11814389001 ROCHE, Sigma). Another 10 ml of RPMI medium was added, followed by centrifugation at 200G for 5 minutes. The supernatant was then filtered through a 40um strainer. Cells were counted and seeded (4,000,000/ml medium). After 2.5 h of adaptation, cells were stimulated with lipopolysaccharide (LPS-2 pg/ml) or concanavalin A (ConA-,.5 pg/ml) for 24 h. After stimulation, supernatants were collected to assess cytokine release using the V- p L e X Proinflammatory Panel 1 kit (mouse) (Meso Scale Discovery, Maryland, USA). For TNFa, IL-10, IL-lp, interferon Y, CXCL2 and IL6. Analyzes were performed using MESO QuickPlex SQ 120, SECTOR Imager 2400, SECTOR Imager 6000, SECTOR S 600.

Anlisis de expresin gnicaGene expression analysis

El ARN total se extrajo usando el kit de aislamiento de ARNmi mirVana (Ambion/Llife technologies, Paisley, Reino Unido) y se trat con ADNasa (Turbo DNA-free, Ambion/life technologies) de acuerdo con las recomendaciones del fabricante. El ARN se cuantific usando el espectrofotmetro NanoDrop (Thermo Fisher Scientific Inc., Wilmington, Delaware, USA) de acuerdo con las instrucciones del fabricante. La calidad del ARN se evalu utilizando el Bioanalizador Agilent (Agilent, Stockport, Reino Unido) de acuerdo con el procedimiento del fabricante y se calcul un nmero de integridad del ARN (RIN). Se us ARN con un valor de RIN> 7 para experimentos posteriores. El ARN se transcribi inversamente a ADNc usando el kit de ADNc de alta capacidad de Applied Biosystems (Applied Biosystems, Warrington, Reino Unido) de acuerdo con las instrucciones del fabricante. Brevemente, se aadi transcriptasa inversa Multiscribe (50 U/pl) (1 )(2)(1 )(10) como parte de la mezcla maestra RT, se incub a 25 C durante 10 min, 37 C durante 2 h, 85 C durante 5 min y se almacen a 4 C. La PCR cuantitativa se llev a cabo usando sondas (6 carboxi fluorescena-FAM) diseadas por Applied Biosystems para genes dirigidos especficos de ratn, mientras que se us p-actina como control endgeno. Las reacciones de amplificacin contenan 1 pl de ADNc, 5 pl de la mezcla maestra de PCR 2X (Roche), 900 nM de cada cebador y se llevaron a un total de 10 pl mediante la adicin de agua libre de ARNasa. Todas las reacciones se realizaron por triplicado usando placas de 96 pocillos en el sistema LightCycler480. Las condiciones de ciclado trmico fueron las recomendadas por el fabricante (Roche) durante 55 ciclos. Para verificar la contaminacin del amplicn, cada serie no contena controles de plantilla por triplicado para cada sonda usada. Se registraron los valores de umbral de ciclo (Ct). Los datos se normalizaron usando p-actina y se transformaron usando el mtodo 2-AACT y se presentaron como veces de cambio frente al grupo de control. Total RNA was extracted using the mirVana miRNA isolation kit (Ambion/Llife technologies, Paisley, UK) and treated with DNase (Turbo DNA-free, Ambion/life technologies) according to the manufacturer's recommendations. RNA was quantified using the NanoDrop spectrophotometer (Thermo Fisher Scientific Inc., Wilmington, Delaware, USA) according to the manufacturer's instructions. RNA quality was assessed using the Agilent Bioanalyzer (Agilent, Stockport, UK) according to the manufacturer's procedure and an RNA integrity number (RIN) was calculated. RNA with an RIN value > 7 was used for further experiments. RNA was reverse transcribed to cDNA using the Applied Biosystems High Throughput cDNA Kit (Applied Biosystems, Warrington, UK) according to the manufacturer's instructions. Briefly, Multiscribe reverse transcriptase (50 U/pl)(1)(2)(1)(10) was added as part of the RT master mix, incubated at 25C for 10 min, 37C for 2 h, 85C for 5 min and stored at 4C. Quantitative PCR was carried out using probes (6 carboxy fluorescein-FAM) designed by Applied Biosystems for targeting mouse-specific genes, while p-actin was used as a control. endogenous. Amplification reactions contained 1 pl of cDNA, 5 pl of 2X PCR master mix (Roche), 900 nM of each primer and brought to a total of 10 pl by the addition of RNase-free water. All reactions were performed in triplicate using 96-well plates on the LightCycler480 system. Thermal cycling conditions were those recommended by the manufacturer (Roche) for 55 cycles. To check for amplicon contamination, each run contained no template controls in triplicate for each probe used. Cycle threshold (Ct) values were recorded. Data was normalized using p-actin and transformed using the 2-AACT method and presented as fold change versus control group.

Anlisis de cidos grasos de cadena corta en el contenido cecalAnalysis of short-chain fatty acids in cecal content

El contenido del ciego se mezcl y agit en vrtex con agua MilliQ y se incub a temperatura ambiente durante 10 minutos. Los sobrenadantes se obtuvieron por centrifugacin (10000 g, 5 min, 4 C) para sedimentar bacterias y otros slidos y filtracin por 0,2gm. Se transfiri a un vial de GC transparente y se us cido 2-etilbutrico (Sigma) como estndar interno. La concentracin de SCFA se analiz usando un sistema de ionizacin por llama Varian 3500 GC, equipado con una columna ZB-FFAP (30 m x 0,32 mm x 0,25 mm; Phenomenex). Se construy una curva estndar con diferentes concentraciones de una mezcla estndar que contiene acetato, propionato, isobutirato, n-butirato, isovalerato y valerato (Sigma). Los picos se integraron usando el software Varian Star Chromatography Workstation versin 6.0. Todos los datos SCFA se expresan como gmol/g.The contents of the cecum were mixed and vortexed with MilliQ water and incubated at room temperature for 10 minutes. Supernatants were obtained by centrifugation (10,000g, 5min, 4C) to pellet bacteria and other solids and 0.2gm filtration. It was transferred to a clear GC vial and 2-ethylbutyric acid (Sigma) was used as internal standard. SCFA concentration was analyzed using a Varian 3500 GC flame ionization system, equipped with a ZB-FFAP column (30 m x 0.32 mm x 0.25 mm; Phenomenex). A standard curve was constructed with different concentrations of a standard mixture containing acetate, propionate, isobutyrate, n-butyrate, isovalerate, and valerate (Sigma). Peaks were integrated using Varian Star Chromatography Workstation version 6.0 software. All SCFA data are expressed as gmol/g.

Anlisis estadsticoStatistic analysis

Los datos normalmente distribuidos se presentan como media SEM; Los conjuntos de datos no paramtricos se presentan como mediana con rango intercuartil. Se aplic la prueba t de dos colas sin emparejar para analizar los datos paramtricos y se us la prueba de Mann-Whitney para los no paramtricos. El coeficiente de correlacin de rango de Spearman se emple para el anlisis de correlacin en los conjuntos de datos agrupados. Un valor de p<0,05 se consider significativo en todos los casos.Normally distributed data are presented as mean SEM; Nonparametric data sets are presented as median with interquartile range. Unpaired two-tailed t-test was applied to analyze parametric data and Mann-Whitney test was used for non-parametric data. Spearman's rank correlation coefficient was used for correlation analysis on the pooled data sets. A value of p<0.05 was considered significant in all cases.

Resultados - Produccin de neurotransmisoresResults - Neurotransmitter production

Los resultados en la Figura 23 muestran el efecto del tratamiento MRx005 sobre la concentracin de neurotransmisores en el cerebro de los ratones. En particular, el tratamiento con MRx005 lleva a una disminucin de la dopamina.The results in Figure 23 show the effect of MRx005 treatment on neurotransmitter concentration in the brain of mice. In particular, treatment with MRx005 leads to a decrease in dopamine.

Resultados - Expresin gnicaResults - Gene Expression

Se analiz la expresin de genes para receptores de neurotransmisores [receptor de serotonina la (5-HTR1a), receptor de dopamina D1, subunidad B1 del receptor de GABA, receptor de GABAA, receptor de NMDA2A (Grin2A) y receptor de NMDA2B (Grin2b)], marcadores inflamatorios [IL-lp, IL6, CD11b, TNFa y TLR4], y marcadores endocrinos [factor de liberacin de corticosterona (CRF), receptores de factor de liberacin de corticosterona 1 y 2 (CRFR1, CRFR2), factor de neurotrofina derivado del cerebro (BDNF), receptor de vasopresina, receptor de oxitocina, receptor de glucocorticoides y receptor de mineralocorticoides] en tejido cerebral del hipocampo, la amgdala y la corteza prefrontal.Gene expression for neurotransmitter receptors [serotonin receptor a (5-HTR1a), dopamine D1 receptor, GABA receptor B1 subunit, GABAA receptor, NMDA2A receptor (Grin2A) and NMDA2B receptor (Grin2b) were analyzed. ], inflammatory markers [IL-lp, IL6, CD11b, TNFa, and TLR4], and endocrine markers [corticosterone-releasing factor (CRF), corticosterone-releasing factor receptors 1 and 2 (CRFR1, CRFR2), neurotrophin factor (BDNF), vasopressin receptor, oxytocin receptor, glucocorticoid receptor, and mineralocorticoid receptor] in brain tissue of the hippocampus, amygdala, and prefrontal cortex.

Las Figuras 24-38 muestran los cambios en la expresin gnica despus del tratamiento con MRX005 o MRX0029 en el hipocampo, la amgdala y la corteza prefrontal. El tratamiento con MRx0029 llev a un aumento en la expresin del receptor de glucocorticoides en la amgdala (Figura 31C). La Figura 32A muestra que MRx005 aument significativamente la expresin de BDNF en la amgdala, mientras que el tratamiento con MRx0029 aument significativamente la expresin de TLR4 en la amgdala (Figura 32).Figures 24-38 show changes in gene expression after MRX005 or MRX0029 treatment in the hippocampus, amygdala, and prefrontal cortex. MRx0029 treatment led to an increase in glucocorticoid receptor expression in the amygdala (FIG. 31C). Figure 32A shows that MRx005 significantly increased BDNF expression in amygdala, while MRx0029 treatment significantly increased TLR4 expression in amygdala (Figure 32).

Tanto MRx005 como MRx0029 pueden aumentar la expresin de CDIlb en la amgdala (Figura 33A), mientras que la expresin de IL-6, Grin2a y Grin2b se reduce despus del tratamiento con MRx005 (Figuras 33B-D). Adems, MRx005 y MRx0029 aumentaron significativamente la expresin de GABRA2 y aumentaron la expresin de GABBR1 en la amgdala.Both MRx005 and MRx0029 can increase CDIlb expression in amygdala (Figure 33A), while IL-6, Grin2a and Grin2b expression is reduced after MRx005 treatment (Figures 33B-D). Furthermore, MRx005 and MRx0029 significantly increased GABRA2 expression and increased GABBR1 expression in amygdala.

El tratamiento con MRx005 llev a un aumento significativo en la expresin de BDNF en la corteza prefrontal (Figura 35B).MRx005 treatment led to a significant increase in BDNF expression in the prefrontal cortex (FIG. 35B).

AnlisisAnalysis

La administracin de MRx005 y MRx0029 provoc cambios en la expresin gnica, especialmente en la amgdala.Administration of MRx005 and MRx0029 caused changes in gene expression, especially in the amygdala.

Resultados - Efecto sobre la expresin de Tph 1 e IDO-1Results - Effect on the expression of Tph 1 and IDO-1

La Figura 39 muestra que MRx0029 puede aumentar significativamente la expresin de triptfano hidroxilasa-1 (Tph1) en el colon y que el tratamiento con MRX005 puede aumentar la expresin de IDO-1 en el colon. El tratamiento con MRX005 aument la expresin de Tph1 e IDOl en el leon (Figura 40).Figure 39 shows that MRx0029 can significantly increase the expression of tryptophan hydroxylase-1 (Tph1) in the colon and that treatment with MRX005 can increase the expression of IDO-1 in the colon. MRX005 treatment increased the expression of Tph1 and IDO1 in the ileum (FIG. 40).

Indoleamina-pirrolo 2,3-dioxigenasa-l (IDO-1) la primera enzima limitante de la velocidad en la va triptfano/quinurenina mientras triptfano hidroxilasa 1 (Tph1), una isoforma de la enzima triptfano hidroxilasa, responsable de la sntesis de serotonina. Estos datos sugieren que MRx0029 y MRx005 pueden afectar los niveles de serotonina y la va de triptfano/quinurenina. Indoleamine-pyrrole 2,3-dioxygenase-l (IDO-1) the first rate-limiting enzyme in the tryptophan/kynurenine pathway while tryptophan hydroxylase 1 (Tph1), an isoform of the enzyme tryptophan hydroxylase, responsible for serotonin synthesis . These data suggest that MRx0029 and MRx005 may affect serotonin levels and the tryptophan/kynurenine pathway.

Resultados - Efecto sobre los niveles de metabolitos de triptfanoResults - Effect on tryptophan metabolite levels

La Figura 41 muestra el efecto del tratamiento con MRx005 sobre los niveles de quinurenina y triptfano circulantes.Figure 41 shows the effect of MRx005 treatment on circulating kynurenine and tryptophan levels.

Resultados - Efecto sobre la expresin de citoquinas de esplenocitosResults - Effect on splenocyte cytokine expression

El ensayo ex vivo de esplenocitos implica desafiar a los esplenocitos (clulas aisladas del bazo, un rgano principal involucrado en la defensa inmune), con un desafo mimtico bacteriano o viral.The ex vivo splenocyte assay involves challenging splenocytes (cells isolated from the spleen, a major organ involved in immune defense), with a mimetic bacterial or viral challenge.

MRX005 redujo significativamente los niveles de interfern-Y en esplenocitos despus de un desafo con LPS (Figura 42). Adems, MRX005 redujo los niveles de interleucina-6 y el factor de necrosis tumoral despus de un desafo con LPS (Figuras 44 y 45, respectivamente). El tratamiento con MRx0029 llev a una reduccin en interfern-Y, interleucina-1 p e interleucina-6 despus de un desafo con LPS (Figuras 42, 43 y 44, respectivamente).MRX005 significantly reduced interferon-Y levels in splenocytes after LPS challenge (FIG. 42). In addition, MRX005 reduced interleukin-6 and tumor necrosis factor levels after LPS challenge (Figures 44 and 45, respectively). MRx0029 treatment led to a reduction in interferon-Y, interleukin-1p and interleukin-6 after LPS challenge (Figures 42, 43 and 44, respectively).

El tratamiento con MRx005 y MRx0029 llev a un aumento en los niveles de CXCL1 quimioatrayente (Figura 47).Treatment with MRx005 and MRx0029 led to an increase in the levels of the chemoattractant CXCL1 (FIG. 47).

Resultados - Efecto sobre los niveles de cidos grasos de cadena corta cecalesResults - Effect on caecal short-chain fatty acid levels

Los cidos grasos de cadena corta (SCFA) se producen cuando las fibras no digeribles de la dieta son fermentadas por bacterias en el intestino. Los efectos de la administracin de MRX005 se muestran en la Figura 48.Short-chain fatty acids (SCFAs) are produced when indigestible dietary fibers are fermented by bacteria in the intestine. The effects of MRX005 administration are shown in Figure 48.

Ejemplo 18 - Anlisis adicional de los cambios inducidos por MRX029 y MRX005 en los niveles de expresin gnicaExample 18 - Further Analysis of MRX029 and MRX005-Induced Changes in Gene Expression Levels

MtodosMethods

Lnea celularCellphone line

Clulas SH-SY5YSH-SY5Y cells

Cepas bacterianasbacterial strains

755: Parabacteroides distasonis (MRX005) 755: Parabacteroides distasonis (MRX005)

Megasphaera massiliensis (MRX0029) qPCR Megasphaera massiliensis (MRX0029) qPCR

Se colocaron en placas SHSY5Y en placas de Petri de 10 cm con una densidad de 2 x 106 clulas. Despus de 24 h, las clulas se trataron en medio de diferenciacin (medio de crecimiento que contena FBS al 1% sin RA) con sobrenadantes de bacterias al 10% o YCFA+, RA 10uM, cido hexanoico 200 uM o cido valproico 200 uM, durante 17 h. Posteriormente, se tomaron imgenes representativas usando un microscopio de ncleo EVOS XL de contraste de fase con un aumento de 40X/0,65. Se recogieron las clulas y se aisl el ARN total de acuerdo con el protocolo RNeasy mini kit (Qiagen). Los ADNc se elaboraron usando el kit de transcripcin inversa de ADNc de alta capacidad (Applied Biosystems). La expresin gnica se midi usando qPCR. Se us GAPDH como control interno. Las veces de cambio se calcularon de acuerdo con el mtodo 2(-ct). Las secuencias de cebadores para MAP2, DRD2, GABRB3, SYP, PrNK1, PARK7 y NSE se proporcionan en el listado de secuencias.SHSY5Y were plated in 10 cm Petri dishes at a density of 2 x 10 6 cells. After 24 h, cells were treated in differentiation medium (growth medium containing 1% FBS without RA) with 10% bacteria supernatants or YCFA+, 10 uM RA, 200 uM hexanoic acid or 200 uM valproic acid, for 5 p.m. Subsequently, representative images were taken using an EVOS XL phase contrast core microscope at 40X/0.65 magnification. Cells were harvested and total RNA was isolated according to the RNeasy mini kit protocol (Qiagen). cDNAs were made using the High Throughput cDNA Reverse Transcription Kit (Applied Biosystems). Gene expression was measured using qPCR. GAPDH was used as an internal control. The times of change were calculated according to the 2(-ct) method. Primer sequences for MAP2, DRD2, GABRB3, SYP, PrNK1, PARK7 and NSE are provided in the sequence listing.

Inmunomarcado e imagenologa celularImmunostaining and cell imaging

Las clulas se sembraron en portaobjetos de cmara de 8 pocillos (Marienfeld Laboratory Glassware) a 5x104 clulas/pocillo durante la noche y se trataron con sobrenadante bacteriano al 10% durante 24 h. Para la diferenciacin, las clulas se trataron con AR 10 nM durante 5 das antes de tratarlas con sobrenadante bacteriano libre de clulas durante 24 h. Posteriormente, las clulas se fijaron con paraformaldehdo al 4% en PBS durante 20 minutos a temperatura ambiente (RT). Las clulas fijadas se lavaron con PBS y se permeabilizaron con Triton X-100 al 1% en PBS durante 10 minutos. Despus de lavar con PBS, los portaobjetos se incubaron con tampn de bloqueo (BSA/PBS al 4%) durante 1 hora a temperatura ambiente antes de aadir el anticuerpo anti-MAP2 o p3-tubulina (sc-74421 y sc-80005 respectivamente, Santa Cruz Biotechnology Inc) diluido en BSA/PBS al 1% durante 12 h a 4 C. Luego se lavaron dos veces con PBS, seguido de incubacin con el anti-ratn conjugado Alexa Flour 488 (Molecular Probes Inc) y la faloidina conjugada Alexa Flour 594 (ab 176757, Abeam) durante 1 hora a RT. Despus de lavar 3 veces con PBS, los portaobjetos se tieron con DAPI y se montaron con Vectashield (Vector Laboratories). Los portaobjetos se observaron usando un microscopio Axioskop 50 (Zeiss) equipado con un objetivo Korr W de 63x/1,2 y conjuntos de filtros adecuados para la deteccin de los fluorocromos usados. Los tiempos de exposicin manual para la adquisicin digital de imgenes inmunomarcadas con MAP-2 se mantuvieron constantes permitiendo la comparacin entre diferentes pocillos y tratamientos. Los tiempos de exposicin a faloidina (F-actina) y DAPI variaron para adaptarse al campo de visin. Los campos de visin aleatorizados se adquirieron usando una cmara Qlmaging controlada por el software Image Pro Plus. Las imgenes se guardaron como archivos TIFF y se abrieron en Adobe Photoshop CC 2015.1.2. Las imgenes de las imgenes MAP-2, DAPI y faloidina se superpusieron y fusionaron. Se seleccionaron imgenes representativas para ilustrar las diferencias en la abundancia y localizacin de las protenas examinadas.Cells were seeded on 8-well chamber slides (Marienfeld Laboratory Glassware) at 5x10 4 cells/well overnight and treated with 10% bacterial supernatant for 24 h. For differentiation, cells were treated with 10 nM RA for 5 days before being treated with cell-free bacterial supernatant for 24 h. Subsequently, the cells were fixed with 4% paraformaldehyde in PBS for 20 min at room temperature (RT). Fixed cells were washed with PBS and permeabilized with 1% Triton X-100 in PBS for 10 minutes. After washing with PBS, slides were incubated with blocking buffer (4% BSA/PBS) for 1 hour at room temperature before adding anti-MAP2 or p3-tubulin antibody (sc-74421 and sc-80005 respectively, Santa Cruz Biotechnology Inc) diluted in 1% BSA/PBS for 12 h at 4C. They were then washed twice with PBS, followed by incubation with Alexa Flour 488 conjugated anti-mouse (Molecular Probes Inc) and Alexa conjugated phalloidin Flour 594 (ab 176757, Abeam) for 1 hour at RT. After washing 3 times with PBS, slides were stained with DAPI and mounted with Vectashield (Vector Laboratories). Slides were viewed using an Axioskop 50 microscope (Zeiss) equipped with a Korr W 63x/1.2 objective and filter sets suitable for detection of the fluorochromes used. Manual exposure times for digital acquisition of MAP-2 immunolabeled images were kept constant allowing comparison between different wells and treatments. Phalloidin (F-actin) and DAPI exposure times varied to suit the field of view. Randomized fields of view were acquired using a camera Qlmaging controlled by Image Pro Plus software. Images were saved as TIFF files and opened in Adobe Photoshop CC 2015.1.2. Images of MAP-2, DAPI and phalloidin images were superimposed and merged. Representative images were selected to illustrate the differences in abundance and localization of the proteins examined.

Inmunotransferenciaimmunoblot

Clulas SH-SY5Y cultivadas en las condiciones indicadas anteriormente, tratadas con MRx0005 y MRx0029 durante 24 horas y luego lisadas en tampn RIPA que contena cctel de inhibidores de proteasa (Roche Diagnostics, Reino Unido). La concentracin de protenas se estim usando el kit de ensayo de protenas BCA (Pierce Biotechnology, Rockford, IL), separado por SDS-PAGE y se transfirieron a una membrana de PVDF. Luego se bloquearon las membranas con leche en polvo desnatada al 5% o BSA al 5% y se incubaron durante la noche a 4 C con los anticuerpos primarios (respectivamente MAP2 y tubulina p3). Luego se incubaron las transferencias con el anticuerpo secundario conjugado con peroxidasa de rbano picante (HRP) apropiado, y las protenas se detectaron mediante un kit de deteccin de quimioluminiscencia (Pierce Biotechnology, Rockford, IL). Tanto para MAP2 como para p3-tubulina, la p-actina sirvi como control para monitorizar la variabilidad de la carga de protenas entre las muestras.SH-SY5Y cells grown under the conditions indicated above, treated with MRx0005 and MRx0029 for 24 hours and then lysed in RIPA buffer containing protease inhibitor cocktail (Roche Diagnostics, UK). Protein concentration was estimated using the BCA protein assay kit (Pierce Biotechnology, Rockford, IL), separated by SDS-PAGE and transferred to a PVDF membrane. Membranes were then blocked with 5% skimmed milk powder or 5% BSA and incubated overnight at 4C with the primary antibodies (respectively MAP2 and tubulin p3). The blots were then incubated with the appropriate horseradish peroxidase (HRP)-conjugated secondary antibody, and proteins were detected using a chemiluminescence detection kit (Pierce Biotechnology, Rockford, IL). For both MAP2 and p3-tubulin, p-actin served as a control to monitor protein loading variability between samples.

Resultados y anlisisResults and analysis

Expresin gnicaGene expression

Las Figuras 13a (insercin del grfico) y 49 muestran los cambios inducidos por MRx0029 y MRX005 en los niveles de expresin de Actina, Villina, Occludina TJP1, TJP2, MAP2, DRD2, GABRB3, SYP, PrNK1, PARK7 y NSE. Figures 13a (graph inset) and 49 show the changes induced by MRx0029 and MRX005 in the expression levels of Actin, Villin, Occludin TJP1, TJP2, MAP2, DRD2, GABRB3, SYP, PrNK1, PARK7 and NSE.

Microscopa e inmunotransferenciaMicroscopy and immunoblotting

La Figura 50 muestra el cambio en el nivel de expresin de MAP2 en clulas SHSY5Y de acuerdo con lo determinado por microscopa confocal. Los niveles de expresin de MAP2 y B3-tubulina tambin se cuantificaron mediante anlisis de inmunotransferencia. Los resultados mostrados en las Figuras 50M y N indican que MRX029 induce un aumento en el nivel de expresin de MAP2.Figure 50 shows the change in the expression level of MAP2 in SHSY5Y cells as determined by confocal microscopy. MAP2 and B3-tubulin expression levels were also quantified by immunoblot analysis. The results shown in Figures 50M and N indicate that MRX029 induces an increase in the expression level of MAP2.

Claims (12)
Hide Dependent
translated from Spanish
REIVINDICACIONES 1. Una composicin que comprende una cepa bacteriana de Megasphaera massiliensis, para su uso en terapia. 1. A composition comprising a bacterial strain of Megasphaera massiliensis, for use in therapy. 2. La composicin para el uso de la reivindicacin 1, para su uso en un mtodo de tratamiento o prevencin de un trastorno neurodegenerativo.2. The composition for use of claim 1, for use in a method of treating or preventing a neurodegenerative disorder. 3. La composicin para el uso de la reivindicacin 1 o 2, en donde la composicin es para su uso en un mtodo para tratar o prevenir una enfermedad o afeccin seleccionada del grupo que consiste de enfermedad de Parkinson, incluyendo parlisis supranuclear progresiva, sndrome de Steele-Richardson-Olszewski, hidrocefalia de presin normal, parkinsonismo vascular o arterioesclertico y parkinsonismo inducido por frmacos; enfermedad de Alzheimer, incluyendo el sndrome de Benson; esclerosis mltiple; enfermedad de Huntington; esclerosis lateral amiotrfica; enfermedad de Lou Gehrig; enfermedad de neuronas motoras; enfermedad prinica; ataxia espinocerebelosa; atrofia muscular espinal; demencia, incluyendo demencia con cuerpos de Lewy, vascular y frontotemporal; afasia progresiva primaria; defecto cognitivo leve; deterioro cognitivo relacionado con el VIH y degeneracin corticobasal.3. The composition for use of claim 1 or 2, wherein the composition is for use in a method of treating or preventing a disease or condition selected from the group consisting of Parkinson's disease, including progressive supranuclear palsy, syndrome of Steele-Richardson-Olszewski, normal pressure hydrocephalus, vascular or arteriosclerotic parkinsonism, and drug-induced parkinsonism; Alzheimer's disease, including Benson syndrome; multiple sclerosis; Huntington's disease; Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis; Lou Gehrig's disease; motor neuron disease; prion disease; Spinocerebellar ataxia; spinal muscular atrophy; dementia, including Lewy body, vascular, and frontotemporal dementia; primary progressive aphasia; mild cognitive impairment; HIV-related cognitive impairment and corticobasal degeneration. 4. La composicin para el uso de la reivindicacin 3, en donde la composicin es para su uso en un mtodo para tratar o prevenir la enfermedad de Parkinson.4. The composition for use of claim 3, wherein the composition is for use in a method of treating or preventing Parkinson's disease. 5. La composicin para el uso de cualquiera de las reivindicaciones 1-4, en donde la composicin es para uso en: (a) un mtodo para tratar o prevenir enfermedades neurodegenerativas de aparicin temprana,5. The composition for use of any of claims 1-4, wherein the composition is for use in: (a) a method of treating or preventing early-onset neurodegenerative diseases, (b) reducir la muerte neuronal o proteger las neuronas,(b) reduce neuronal death or protect neurons, (c) un mtodo para prevenir o retrasar el inicio o la progresin de un trastorno neurodegenerativo,(c) a method of preventing or delaying the onset or progression of a neurodegenerative disorder, (d) un mtodo para reducir los niveles de IL-6 y/o los niveles de NFkB en el tratamiento o prevencin de un trastorno neurodegenerativo, y/o(d) a method of reducing IL-6 levels and/or NFkB levels in the treatment or prevention of a neurodegenerative disorder, and/or (e) un mtodo para aumentar los niveles de dopamina y/o DOPAC en el tratamiento o prevencin de un trastorno neurodegenerativo.(e) a method of increasing dopamine and/or DOPAC levels in the treatment or prevention of a neurodegenerative disorder. 6. La composicin para el uso de la reivindicacin 1, para su uso en un mtodo de tratamiento de lesiones cerebrales.6. The composition for the use of claim 1, for use in a method of treating brain injuries. 7. La composicin para el uso de la reivindicacin 6, en donde la lesin cerebral es un ataque cerebral, como isquemia cerebral, isquemia cerebral focal, ataque cerebral isqumico o ataque cerebral hemorrgico.7. The composition for use of claim 6, wherein the brain injury is a stroke, such as cerebral ischemia, focal cerebral ischemia, ischemic stroke or hemorrhagic stroke. 8. La composicin para el uso de cualquiera de las reivindicaciones 1-7, en donde la cepa bacteriana tiene una secuencia de ARNr 16s que es por lo menos un 95%, 96%, 97%, 98%, 99%, 99,5% o 99,9% idntica a la SEQ ID NO:1 o 2, opcionalmente en donde la cepa bacteriana tiene una secuencia de ARNr 16s que es por lo menos un 95%, 96%, 97%, 98%, 99%, 99,5% o 99,9% idntica a la SEQ ID NO:2, o en donde el la cepa bacteriana tiene la secuencia de ARNr 16s representada por la SEQ ID NO:2.8. The composition for the use of any of claims 1-7, wherein the bacterial strain has a 16s rRNA sequence that is at least 95%, 96%, 97%, 98%, 99%, 99, 5% or 99.9% identical to SEQ ID NO:1 or 2, optionally wherein the bacterial strain has a 16s rRNA sequence that is at least 95%, 96%, 97%, 98%, 99% , 99.5% or 99.9% identical to SEQ ID NO:2, or wherein the bacterial strain has the 16s rRNA sequence represented by SEQ ID NO:2. 9. La composicin para el uso de cualquiera de las reivindicaciones anteriores, en donde la composicin es para administracin oral y/o en donde la composicin comprende uno o ms excipientes o portadores farmacuticamente aceptables.9. The composition for use of any preceding claim, wherein the composition is for oral administration and/or wherein the composition comprises one or more pharmaceutically acceptable excipients or carriers. 10. La composicin para el uso de cualquier reivindicacin anterior, en donde la cepa bacteriana est liofilizada. 10. The composition for use of any preceding claim, wherein the bacterial strain is lyophilized. 11. La composicin para el uso de cualquier reivindicacin anterior, en donde la cepa bacteriana es la cepa bacteriana Megasphaera massiliensis depositada con el nmero de registro NCIMB 42787.11. The composition for use of any preceding claim, wherein the bacterial strain is the Megasphaera massiliensis bacterial strain deposited under registration number NCIMB 42787. 12. Un producto alimenticio o composicin de vacuna que comprende la composicin de cualquier reivindicacin anterior, para el uso de cualquier reivindicacin anterior. 12. A food product or vaccine composition comprising the composition of any preceding claim, for the use of any preceding claim.
